2A3F2343.WorldTier4_MonsterInfo:
{icon:bullet, 1}  Enemies are more fearsome
{icon:bullet, 1}  Monsters give {c_highlight}200%{/c} increased Experience 
{icon:bullet, 1}  Monsters drop {c_highlight}15%{/c} more Gold
{icon:bullet, 1}  Monsters overcome {c_highlight}40%{/c} Resistance

2BCBA672.WorldTier3_Detail1: Champion monsters now have a chance to appear.

2BCBA673.WorldTier3_Detail2: Sacred items now have a low chance of dropping.

2BCBA674.WorldTier3_Detail3: Nightmare Sigils which in turn unseal Nightmare Dungeons are unlocked.

2BCBA675.WorldTier3_Detail4: Players gain 100% XP bonus. Non-Physical resistances are reduced by 20%.

426FB110.WorldTier2_Recommended:
{icon:bullet, 1}  Players who desire more challenge
{icon:bullet, 1}  Levels {c_highlight}1-50{/c}

42D2C470.WorldTier1_Detail1: {icon:bullet, 1}  Recommended for new players to Diablo or want a light challenge

44679DFB.WorldTier4_Unlock: Unlocked by completing the {c_highlight}Fallen Temple{/c} Capstone Dungeon {icon:Marker_DungeonChallenge, 2.0} in northeastern Dry Steppes, {c_highlight}World Tier 3: Nightmare{/c}.

5825C91A.WorldTier3_Unlock: Unlocked by completing the Campaign and {c_highlight}Cathedral of Light{/c} Capstone Dungeon {icon:Marker_DungeonChallenge, 2.0} in Kyovashad, {c_highlight}World Tier 2: Veteran{/c}.

5BB7C474.WT1_Bullet1: Recommended for new players to Diablo or want a light challenge

A0481774.WorldTier4_Detail2: Rare Nightmare Sigils unsealing more difficult challenges are unlocked.

A0481775.WorldTier4_Detail3: Players gain 150% XP bonus. Non-Physical resistances are reduced by 30%.

{icon:bullet, 1}  {c_highlight}Helltides{/c} can appear across Sanctuary
{icon:bullet, 1}  {c_highlight}Champion{/c} monsters with damage resistance auras can appear

F808B6E4.WorldTiers_Warning:
Changing your World Tier terminates all active portals and resets all incomplete Whisper progress.

Players will need to be on the same World Tier to form a party.
